message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $1200000 for the product.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a bit steep at $1200000, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the value of the product to your business, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $1050000.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $950000. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your position, Bob. Let me see if I can bridge the gap. My counteroffer for the product is $1000000.
